title: Stephen B. Licata v. U.S. Postal Service
passages: This opinion is published in the Federal reporter in a table titled “Table of decisions without reported opinions”. These decisions do not meet the specific criteria for publication since they have been determined as being of no precedential or institutional value. (Third Circuit Rules, App. 1, Internal Operating Procedures, Ch. 5, sec. 5.1, 28 U.S.C.A.)
